pr_title: Move the error description to a separate allocation as it is rarely u…

timeline.message:
Move the error description to a separate allocation as it is rarely used.
This reduces the size of frequently used objects.
Track size of frequently used objects.

timeline.bodyText: Is the global object really needed here, vs. just returning a default-constructed stringref?
timeline.author: vekterli

replies.bodyText: No, you are right. Old habit....
replies.author: baldersheim
